entry.string: The mail module controls the ways that your Xaraya system sends mail to users or groups of users. This module is a utility module and takes information from other modules installed on your Xaraya system and formats the mail for them. This module at its heart is using the
classes for processing. These classes extend Xaraya to allow you to use SMTP, SendMail or the normal PHP Mail functions.

entry.string: From the menu, you have two choices.
entry.translation: Από το μενού έχετε δύο επιλογές.

entry.string: "Modify Configuration". From this menu option, you can update the necessary configuration options, such as the email address that you want to send from, reply to address, type of mail system to use, etc.
"Test Configuration". From this menu option you can test your mail system configuration.
Other modules can request that a certain mail be sent no earlier than a specific time.
This will have no effect unless you install the 'scheduler' module first.
entry.translation: Αυτό δεν θα έχει καμμία επίδραση εκτός αν έχει ήδη εγκατασταεθί η μονάδα 'χρονοπρογραμματισμός'

entry.string: In order to support that, you can configure the mail module to use the 'scheduler' and check if any mails need to be sent e.g. every x hours. Otherwise, those mails will be sent immediately.
The mail hook allows you to send an email to the site admin when something (content, users, etc) is created or deleted. This can be configured in the modules module.
Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
